```{r Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(here); library(tidyverse)
```
```{r Data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
cmp<-read_csv(here("CMP.zip"))
```
```{r Cleaning}
#per109:internationalism_negative,per406:protectionism_positive,per608:multiculturalism_negative,per601:national_...
cmp2 <- cmp %>%
  filter(date>"197912" & date<"202101") %>%
  group_by(countryname,partyname) %>%
  summarise(anti=mean(per109+per608),vote=mean(pervote),parfam=mean(parfam))
cmp3 <- cmp2
cmp3$lg_anti <- ifelse(cmp3$anti>1 & cmp3$vote>10,1,0)
cmp3$lg_anti_natpar <- ifelse(cmp3$anti>1 & cmp3$vote>20 & cmp3$parfam==70,1,0)
cmp3<-cmp3 %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(countryname) %>%
  summarise(lg_anti=sum(lg_anti),lg_anti_natpar=sum(lg_anti_natpar))
```

May be able to infer that if `lg_anti` is 0, then incumbent political system has failed to respond to anti-globalist sentiment IF it exists
